SELECT * FROM( SELECT A.NNO AS NNO -- 공지사항 글번호 ,A.NSUBJECT AS NSUBJECT -- 공지사항 제목 ,A.NNAME AS NNAME -- 공지사항 작성자 ,A.NIMG AS NIMG -- 공자사항 이미지 ,A.NCONTENT AS NCONTENT -- 공지사항 내용 ,A.NDELETEYN AS NDELETEYN -- 공지사항 삭제여부 ,TO_CHAR(A.NINSERTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NINSERTDATE -- 공비사항 등록일자 ,TO_CHAR(A.NUPDATEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NUPDATEDATE -- 공지사항 수정일자
,CEIL(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.NNO DESC)/#{pagesize, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AS PAGENO ,COUNT(A.NNO) OVER() AS TOTALCOUNT ,#{curpage, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS CURPAGE ,#{pagesize, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS PAGESIZE ,#{groupsize, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS GROUPSIZE
FROM NOTICE A, PAGING B WHERE A.NDELETEYN ='N' AND PNO='P004'
AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.NINSERTDATE),'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(A.NINSERTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND NSUBJECT LIKE '%' || #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND NCONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND NSUBJECT LIKE '%' || #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR NCONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
ORDER BY 1 DESC ) WHERE PAGENO =#{curpage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT A.NNO AS NNO ,A.NSUBJECT AS NSUBJECT ,A.NNAME AS NNAME ,A.NIMG AS NIMG ,A.NCONTENT AS NCONTENT ,A.NDELETEYN AS NDELETEYN ,TO_CHAR(A.NINSERTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NINSERTDATE ,TO_CHAR(A.NUPDATEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NUPDATEDATE FROM NOTICE A WHERE NDELETEYN='N' AND NNO=#{nno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
